Notice of Copyright

All information on this website, including text, photos, and code, is protected as a collective work and belongs to the respective owners in accordance with copyright laws in New Jersey and other jurisdictions. This collaborative effort also includes content that is licensed for use. Notice of Copyright 2016. All rights reserved. For the sole purpose of placing an order or completing a purchase, this website may be copied and printed in hard copy. Subject to any special restrictions or limits pertaining to certain items, you are free to use the content from different sections of the website for personal, non-commercial purposes, or to place product orders. It is completely forbidden to use the content in any other way without authorisation, including but not limited to reproduction and dissemination transmission or display of the content on this website. You also promise that any files you download from the website will not have any proprietary notices changed or removed. Restrictions on Accountability

You will not be held accountable for any special or indirect damages that arise from using, or not using, the materials on this website or the goods’ functionality, even though you were informed of the possibility of these kinds of losses. If the legislation in your region does not permit the limitation or exclusion of liability, or for any additional or indirect losses, then you may not be covered by the following restriction or exclusion.

Return Policy

Unfortunately, we are unable to accept refunds for items that have been downloaded. As a result, make sure that every software meets your needs before making a purchase (each program provides a free trial version and the necessary system requirements). Refund Policy Guidelines Every sale is final. Software downloaded via the Internet is not refundable. There won’t be a reimbursement if the customer is at fault. The faulty item will be replaced with the same one. Each software package has a trial version that can be used for 14–90 days. Typographic Errors Orders for products that are inadvertently posted at the incorrect price, including product listings, may be rejected or cancelled at our discretion. We continue to have the authority to reject or cancel any such orders, even if the order has been confirmed and your credit card has been charged. We will reimburse your credit card account with the amount of the inaccurate pricing if you decide to cancel your order after your credit card has been charged for the purchase. Length; Final You accept these terms and conditions by using the website and/or finishing the registration or purchasing process. These terms and conditions may be terminated in whole or in part at any time, for any cause, and without prior notice. Terms pertaining to copyrights, trademarks, indemnity, liability limitations, and other unspecified issues shall not be affected by any termination Any updates will be communicated to you via email, a general notice posted on the website, or another trustworthy contact mechanism. Interaction Email will be our only means of communication. We will respond to your message within a day.

General Information  

Notwithstanding the principles governing the choice of law, the laws of New Jersey shall govern your use of this website in all respects; the 1980 U.N. Convention on Contracts for the International Sale of Goods shall not apply. You acknowledge that New Jersey shall possess exclusive authority and jurisdiction over any legal issues pertaining to this website, including, but not limited to, product purchases. Any legal claims or concerns regarding the website (including purchases) must be submitted within one year from the date they arise. It is important to understand that these terms and conditions do not exempt you from any other rights or obligations. Furthermore, these terms and conditions shall not be modified by trade customs or prior interactions between the parties. The website reserves the right to assign its rights and obligations under this agreement to another entity at any time and without prior notice. Additionally, you agree not to affiliate with or join any other organisations.

Usage Agreement  

This agreement disclaims any liability for the content of communications or materials uploaded by users accessing the site, as it is unable to review such content. By providing you access to user-generated content on the site, it is understood that you are acting solely as a passive conduit for its distribution and bear no responsibility for any activities or content posted. However, the website retains the right to refuse or remove any messages or content that it deems: (a) offensive, libellous, or defamatory; (b) dishonest, false, or misleading; (c) infringing upon copyright, trademark, or other intellectual property rights; or (d) objectionable or inappropriate in any other way, at its sole discretion.  

Payment Terms  

By utilising your Internet account to access the site, you or any other individual agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless the website’s officers, directors, employees, agents, licensors, and suppliers from any losses, expenses, damages, and costs (including reasonable attorney fees).

Trademarks

All trademarks and trade names displayed on this website are either registered trademarks or trademarks owned by their respective companies.

Disclaimer of Warranty  

This website and all associated content and products are provided “as is” without any warranties, whether express or implied. We expressly disclaim all warranties, including but not limited to implied warranties of merchantability, suitability for a particular purpose, and non-infringement, to the fullest extent permitted by law. We do not guarantee the uninterrupted operation of the site, the resolution of any technical issues, or the absence of viruses or other harmful components on the site or its hosting server.

Ordering  

The software offered on this site is available for download. Upon completing your purchase, you will receive an email containing instructions for downloading and a unique registration code, which will be sent to you within 24 hours. For security reasons, we do not retain registration codes, so it is essential to save the code immediately upon receipt.

Limitation of Responsibility  

While we inform you of the potential for financial loss, we shall not be liable for any additional damages arising from the use or inability to use the materials on this site, or from the performance of the products. This limitation or exclusion may not apply to you if your local laws do not permit such restrictions.

Return Policies

We’re sorry, but we can’t accept returns for downloaded items. Before you buy anything, make sure the product suits your needs. Every program includes a free trial version, and it must meet your system requirements.

Refund Policies

All sales are final. We can’t refund software that was downloaded over the internet. If the customer is at fault, there will be no refund. We’ll use the same item to replace the faulty one. Every software comes with a trial version for 14–90 days of use.

Typographic Errors

We have the right to reject or cancel any orders for products that have incorrect pricing listed. This includes any product listings. We can reject or cancel any such orders, even if your credit card has already been charged and the order has been confirmed. If you decide to cancel your order after your credit card has been charged, we’ll refund the amount that was charged for the incorrect price to your credit card.

Ending

By accessing the website and/or going through the registration or shopping process, you agree to these terms and conditions. Any part of these terms and conditions, or all of them, can be ended at any time, without giving us any notice. Any ending will not change the terms related to copyrights, trademarks, indemnity, limitations of liability, and other miscellaneous matters.
You will be notified through email, a general notice on the website, or another reliable method of contact that you provided.

Communication

All communication will be conducted exclusively via email. You can anticipate a response from us within one business day. 

Notwithstanding any principles regarding the choice of law, the laws of New Jersey will govern your interactions with this website in all respects; the 1980 U.N. Convention on Contracts for the International Sale of Goods shall not apply. You acknowledge that New Jersey will possess exclusive authority and jurisdiction over any legal issues arising from or related to this website, whether directly or indirectly, including but not limited to product purchases. Any legal claims or concerns associated with the website (including but not limited to product purchases) must be submitted within one year from the date they arise. It is important to understand that these terms and conditions do not release you from any other rights or obligations. The terms and conditions will remain unaffected by trade customs or the historical interactions between the parties. The website may, at any time and without prior notice, assign its rights and obligations under this agreement to another entity. Furthermore, you agree not to affiliate with any other organisation or group.

You accept no liability for the content of any communications or materials generated or uploaded by users of the site, as the site is unable to review such content. By providing access to user-generated content, you are merely serving as a passive conduit for its distribution and assume no responsibility or liability for any activities or content posted. Nevertheless, the site reserves the right to refuse or remove any messages or content that it deems: (a) offensive, libellous, or defamatory; (b) dishonest, false, or misleading; (c) infringing upon copyright, trademark, or other intellectual property rights; (d) violating the rights of others; or (e) objectionable or inappropriate in any other way, at its sole discretion.

Terms and Conditions

By utilizing your Internet account to access the site, you or any other individual agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless the website’s officers, directors, employees, agents, licensors, and suppliers from any losses, expenses, damages, and costs (including reasonable legal fees) that may arise from any activities associated with your account (including negligent or wrongful conduct).

Third Party Links

We may incorporate links to external websites to enhance the value we provide to our users. However, it is essential to understand that these third-party sites operate independently and have their own privacy and data collection policies, regardless of any affiliation. You should proceed with caution when navigating these linked sites, as they are offered solely for your convenience. We encourage you to provide feedback regarding both our website and the linked sites, particularly if you encounter any issues with a specific link, to help us maintain the quality of our website and the connections we have established.
